```{r}
library(tidyverse)
dat <- read.csv("data/mouse-tmp.csv")
```

## Bimodal distribution of weight

```{r}
dat %>%
  ggplot(aes(weight)) + 
  geom_histogram(color = "white", bins = 30)
```

## Simpson's paradox

```{r}
dat %>%
  ggplot(aes(dbp, sbp)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(se=F, method = "lm")

dat %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_point(aes(dbp, sbp, color = factor(cage))) +
  geom_smooth(aes(dbp, sbp, color = factor(cage)), se=F, method = "lm") +
  geom_smooth(aes(dbp, sbp), se=F, method = "lm", col = "black")
```
